text: Hi guys, wondering if you could help. I am calling the GET/crm/v3/objects/companies/{companyId} call and the address details of the company aren't being returned in the response. Could somebody tell me how to make sure these details are returned please?

:wave: Hi everyone! Recently we started doing integration of HubSpot with our product <https://emailanalytics.com/|EmailAnalytics>. On EmailAnalytics we provide a detailed analytics of their all inbound & outbound emails. Now we want our customer to get the emails of their customer from HubSpot into our software.

The way it works currently is they create `Contact Views` in HubSpot and we want to get all contacts inside that views into our software. We are not able to find Contact View API inside our developer account.

Can anyone help me finding that API from where we can get list of contacts inside any `Contact view`

Much Thanks,
Hiren
<http://EmailAnalytics.com|EmailAnalytics.com>
What properties are you requesting in your body?
Can you show the JSON for the body of your request
I want to display them on a HubSpot web page, one that's only visible to people  on our membership list

<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/companies/get_companies_modified>

Anyone know if there’s a max for the ‘count’ parameter? The documentation for HubSpot’s APIs both legacy and new are so inconsistent in defining limits to ‘count’ or ‘limit’ query parameters. I would assume i could set it to the maximum limit of 10k since that’s all i’m able to get from this endpoint :thinking_face: and it’s not specified.
